MOV A, 1
MOV B, 0
MOV BLL, ALL
MOV C, [0x0666]
NOP
INT
HALT

Hand-assembled, just for you:

0x0003 0x83 0x03 0x0001 0x0001
0x0003 0x83 0x03 0x0002 0x0000
0x0003 0x95 0x95 0x0002 0x0001
0x0003 0x83 0x43 0x0003 0x0666
0x0000 0x00 0x00 0x0000 0x0000
0x0002 0x00 0x00 0x0000 0x0000
0x0001 0x00 0x00 0x0000 0x0000
